src.aruko.aruko_helpers module¶

src.aruko.aruko_helpers.compute_fiducial_center_point(p0, p1)[source]¶

Compute center point between two diagonal corners.

src.aruko.aruko_helpers.determine_horizontal_offset(image, fiducial_center, screen_width)[source]¶

Calculate horizontal offset from center of image.

src.aruko.aruko_helpers.dist_between_points(a, b)[source]¶

Calculate distance between two points.

src.aruko.aruko_helpers.draw_marker_bounds(image, bounds, color=(0, 255, 0), thickness=2)[source]¶
src.aruko.aruko_helpers.extract_corners_points(corners)[source]¶

Extract the four corner points from ArUco marker corners.

src.aruko.aruko_helpers.extract_data_from_marker(image, corners, ids)[source]¶

Extract all relevant data from detected marker (first marker found).

src.aruko.aruko_helpers.extract_data_from_marker_by_id(image, corners, ids, target_marker_id)[source]¶

Extract data from a specific marker ID. Only returns data if the target marker is found, otherwise returns -1 for marker_id. This prevents the robot from getting stuck looking at incorrect markers.

src.aruko.aruko_helpers.get_aruko_marker(image)[source]¶

Detect ArUco markers in an image.

src.aruko.aruko_helpers.get_fiducial_area_from_corners(c0, c1, c2, c3)[source]¶

Calculate approximate area of the marker.
